entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having never been through the corridor before.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is excitedly leading him and Ron through the corridor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is following Hermione down the corridor.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: A person mentioned as having gone through the door the night after the Goblet of Fire had regurgitated Harry and Ron's names.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The teacher who has a dungeon that is accessed through a gloomy underground passage.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are following Hermione down the corridor.
Harry is also following Ron down the corridor.
